title: The Alexander™ All Suite Oceanfront Resort Embraces Glamorous Past For Bright Future
text:
The Alexander All Suite Oceanfront Resort
Hotel in Miami Beach revisits its celebrated history under new ownership
MIAMI BEACH, Fla. , Sept. 1, Boasting a storied and star-filled past, The Alexander™ All Suite Oceanfront Resort has set out to bring its history back to life under the resort's new ownership.
Infamous for its quiet opulence, the oceanfront resort in Miami Beach has a history of housing movie stars, musicians and political figures seeking a low-key escape with luxury. Sean Connery , Madonna, Elizabeth Taylor , Margaret Thatcher and President Bill Clinton are just a handful of the notable guests that have graced the exclusive property over the years.
The Alexander™ All Suite Oceanfront Resort also served as an acting base for the hit TV show Miami Vice and was shown in great detail in season two, episode 12's "Definitely Miami" as Sonny Crockett , aka Don Johnson , emerges from the oceanfront balcony to breathtaking morning scenery.
With this in mind, the new property owners are diving into projects and renovations that will bring the old Miami vibe – both sophisticated and celebrated – back into the spotlight for the Miami Beach resort. A hidden jewel of luxury and elegance among its South Beach neighbors, The Alexander™ shelters guests from the crowds while embracing the energy of the city through stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean and Millionaire's Row.
Step into stylish one- and two- bedroom condo suites , each boasting its own character while mesmerizing travelers with VIP-worthy balconies and views. Dine like a celebrity with award-winning restaurants like Shula's Steakhouse , named among the Top 10 Steakhouses in America, while enjoying signature cuts of premium Black Angus beef and fresh seafood.
It wouldn't be a Miami vacation without making a splash. The oceanfront resort in Miami Beach boasts a private beach with sugary white sand and crystal blue waters, as well as two sparkling resort-style pools surrounded by shady palm trees and plush lounge chairs. Take it all in while staying refreshed with tropical cocktails and snacks from Top of the Falls .
About The Alexander All Suite Oceanfront Resort
The Alexander™ All Suite Oceanfront Resort at 5225 Collins Ave. in Miami Beach, FL is near Miami Design District, Miami Beach Botanical Gardens and Miami Beach Golf Club. The resort features one- and two-bedroom condo suites, two outdoor pools, four restaurants, 10 meeting rooms with 12,000 square feet of event space and beach access. For information, visit www.alexanderhotel.com or call 1-305-865-6500.
